Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Westbound Reroute near Foster/Francisco
ShortDescription: Westbound 92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Western, Lawrence and Kedzie: due to, street blockage near Foster/Francisco.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Western, Lawrence and Kedzie: due to, street blockage near Foster/Francisco.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
